title: Life at the top
creator_credit: Film Victoria, Victoria. Ministry of Housing and Construction and Melissa Juhanson
brief_description: Radiating from a dreary housing estate come the personalities of colourful individuals that have made their own worlds in a potentially depressing situation of high rise living in Australia. A multi-award winning film.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Victoria, Victoria. Ministry of Housing and Construction and Melissa Juhanson
